/*
:name: time_task
:description: $time test
:tags: 20.3
:unsynthesizable: 1
*/
module top();

initial
	$display($time);

endmodule

----

      (module_keyword)
      name: (simple_identifier)
      (list_of_ports))
    (module_item
      (initial_construct
        (statement_or_null
          (statement
            (statement_item
              (subroutine_call_statement
                (subroutine_call
                  (system_tf_call
                    (system_tf_identifier)
                    (list_of_arguments
                      (expression
                        (primary
                          (function_subroutine_call
                            (subroutine_call
                              (system_tf_call
                                (system_tf_identifier)))))))))))))))))
